long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Chess Experience with Themed Chess Sets on Lichess!

Elevate your chess game with our sleek extension that lets you customize the default chess set on Lichess to a variety of stunning, themed chess sets. Whether you're a fan of classic styles or prefer something more modern, our extension brings a fresh aesthetic to your chess board, making every move more exciting!

Key Features:

Easy Installation: Seamlessly integrates with Lichess and changes your default chess set with just a few clicks.
Variety of Themes: Choose from a wide selection of themed chess sets, including modern, fantasy, and classic designs. New sets are added every week, so there's always something fresh to try!
Smooth User Experience: Enjoy a hassle-free and intuitive interface for switching between themes, so you can focus on your game.
Free and Open-Source: No hidden fees—just pure chess fun with no strings attached!
Whether you're playing a quick game or diving into an intense match, our extension adds a personal touch to your Lichess experience. Install it now and make your chessboard uniquely yours!
